channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: NoLongerEvil-Thermostat – Nest Generation 1 and 2 Firmware
item.description:
Flashing this firmware may brick your device or cause unexpected behavior. Important: After flashing this firmware, your device will no longer contact Nest/Google servers. Link your device To link your Nest device to your NoLongerEvil account: On your Nest device, navigate to: Settings → Nest App → Get Entry Code The device will display a unique entry code Enter this code on the NoLongerEvil dashboard Your device is now linked and ready to use.

Read more

item.title: Codemaps: Understand Code, Before You Vibe It
item.description:
We all need more AI that turns your brain ON, not OFF. 5) model to generate your Codemap. Every Codemap is snapshots your code and respects ZDR.

Read more

item.title: How AGI became the most consequential conspiracy theory of our time
item.description:
It’s obviously important that any superintelligence anyone builds does not go rogue. People are used to hearing that this or that is the next big thing, says Shannon Vallor, who studies the ethics of technology at the University of Edinburgh. “It’s normal to have something presented to you and be told that this thing is the future.

Read more
